name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable and sustainable cotton t-shirt made from 100% organic materials. Available in multiple colors and sizes.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking watch with heart rate monitor, GPS, and smartphone connectivity. Track your workouts and health metrics.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Eco-friendly insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Perfect for outdoor activities.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Stylish and practical leather crossbody bag with multiple compartments. Perfect for everyday use and travel.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator lights.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Perfect thickness for comfort and stability during practice.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Set of 4 beautiful ceramic coffee mugs with modern design. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Denim Jacket Classic
description: Timeless denim jacket with comfortable fit and durable construction. Perfect for layering in any season.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof portable speaker with 360-degree sound and 20-hour battery life. Perfect for outdoor adventures.

name: Organic Face Cream
description: Natural face cream with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E. Suitable for all skin types and free from harmful chemicals.

name: Running Shoes Lightweight
description: Lightweight running shoes with superior cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Perfect for daily runs and training.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: 1080p security camera with night vision and motion detection. Connects to your smartphone for remote monitoring.

name: Bamboo Cutting Board Set
description: Set of 3 bamboo cutting boards in different sizes. Eco-friendly and knife-friendly surface.

name: Sunglasses Polarized
description: Polarized sunglasses with UV400 protection and lightweight frame. Classic design for everyday wear.

name: Electric Toothbrush Sonic
description: Sonic electric toothbrush with 3 cleaning modes and 2-minute timer. Includes travel case and replacement heads.

name: Laptop Stand Adjustable
description: Adjustable laptop stand with ergonomic design. Improves posture and provides better airflow for your device.

name: Organic Tea Collection
description: Assorted collection of organic teas including green, black, and herbal varieties. 50 tea bags total.

name: Resistance Band Set
description: Set of 5 resistance bands with different resistance levels. Perfect for home workouts and strength training.

name: Aromatherapy Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic aromatherapy diffuser with LED mood lighting. Perfect for creating a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: High-performance wireless gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting and 25K DPI sensor.

name: Silk Pillowcase Set
description: Set of 2 silk pillowcases that protect hair and skin while you sleep. Hypoallergenic and gentle on skin.

name: Protein Powder Vanilla
description: Premium whey protein powder with 24g protein per serving. Great for post-workout recovery and muscle building.

name: Smart LED Light Bulbs
description: Set of 4 smart LED bulbs with voice control and 16 million colors. Compatible with Alexa and Google Home.

name: Organic Face Mask Set
description: Set of 5 organic face masks with different ingredients for various skin concerns. Cruelty-free and vegan.
